heroSubtitle: Expert visa consultancy services to help you navigate the complexities of international travel and secure your dream visa.
faqSubtitle: Here are some frequently asked questions that may help you learn more about us and our services.

items.question: What types of visas do you offer consultancy for?
items.answer: We offer consultancy for a wide range of visas, including tourist visas, work visas, student visas, and family reunification visas.

items.question: How can I start the consultancy process?
items.answer: You can start the process by filling out the contact form on our website or by reaching out to us directly via phone or email.

items.question: What is the cost of the consultancy service?
items.answer: The cost varies depending on the type of visa and the complexity of the case. Please contact us for a tailored quote.

items.question: How long does the visa application process take?
items.answer: The duration depends on the type of visa and the country you are applying to. We will provide you with a more accurate time estimate based on your individual case.

section1.title: 1. Data Protection at a Glance
section1.generalInfoText1: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website.
section1.generalInfoText2: Personal data refers to any information that can be used to identify you personally, such as name, email address, phone number, or official documents.
section1.generalInfoText3: Detailed information on data protection can be found in the sections below.
section1.dataControllerQuestion: Who is responsible for data collection?
section1.dataControllerAnswer: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. Contact details can be found in the section “Responsible Entity”.
section1.dataCollectionQuestion: How do we collect your data?
section1.dataCollectionList1: Data you provide directly, for example via contact forms or service requests
section1.dataCollectionList2: Technical data collected automatically when you visit the website (e.g. browser type, operating system, time of access, IP address)
section1.dataUsageQuestion: Why do we use your data?
section1.dataUsageList1: To ensure proper operation of the website
section1.dataUsageList2: To process inquiries and communicate with you
section1.dataUsageList3: To provide services related to visas, employment, accommodation, and courses
section1.dataUsageList4: To analyze and improve website performance
section1.rightsIntro: You have the right at any time to:
section1.rightsList2: Request correction or deletion of your data
section1.rightsList4: Withdraw your consent at any time
section1.rightsList5: Lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority
section1.rightsOutro: You may contact us at any time with questions regarding data protection.

section2.title: 2. General Information and Mandatory Disclosures
section2.dataProtectionText1: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously and treat it confidentially in accordance with applicable data protection laws, in particular the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
section2.dataProtectionText2: Please note that data transmission over the Internet (e.g. email communication) may have security vulnerabilities and complete protection against third-party access cannot be guaranteed.
section2.controllerExplanation: The responsible entity is the natural or legal person that determines the purposes and means of processing personal data.
section2.legalBasisIntro: Personal data is processed in accordance with Article 6 GDPR on the following legal bases:
section2.legalBasisList2: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR – Performance of a contract or pre-contractual measures
section2.storageDurationText1: We store personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.
section2.storageDurationText2: Data will be deleted once the purpose no longer applies or upon your request for deletion, unless statutory retention obligations require longer storage.
section2.withdrawConsentText1: You may withdraw your consent to the processing of your personal data at any time.
section2.withdrawConsentText2: The withdrawal does not affect the lawfulness of processing carried out prior to the withdrawal.
section2.withdrawConsentText3: Consent may be withdrawn informally by contacting us using the details provided above.
section2.dataTransferTitle: Transfer of Data to Third Countries
section2.dataTransferText1: Personal data may be transferred to countries outside the European Union (third countries) when using external services such as Google or WhatsApp.
section2.dataTransferText2: Such transfers are carried out exclusively on the basis of Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission.

section3.title: 3. Data Collection on This Website
section3.cookiesText1: This website uses cookies to ensure proper functionality and to improve the user experience.
section3.cookiesText2: Analytical cookies are only used after your explicit consent.
section3.cookiesText3: You can disable cookies at any time via your browser settings.
section3.contactFormText: If you submit inquiries via the contact form, the information you provide will be stored for the purpose of processing your request and for follow-up questions. This data will not be shared with third parties without your consent.
section3.emailPhoneText: If you contact us by email or phone, the data you provide will be used solely to process your inquiry.
section3.whatsappText1: We use WhatsApp Business for communication if you voluntarily choose this channel.
section3.whatsappText2: Personal data may be processed by Meta Platforms.
section3.whatsappText3: Using WhatsApp is optional and you may choose alternative communication methods at any time.

section4.title: 4. Social Media
section4.text: This website may contain elements or links to social media platforms. When activating such elements, data may be transmitted to the respective providers in accordance with their privacy policies.
